A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If lack of character development isn't enough\, how about no clear narrative and a complete undoing of story from the preceding film?  With so much wrong with this movie I'll let the 1.5 stars I gave it speak for itself (giving it 1.5 stars since I disliked ‘The Phantom Menace' even more).  How do the critics justify a 91% Fresh rating while the audience is hovering at 44% Rotten?!
